sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libdv package contains dvconnect, encodedv, playdv and libdv.

sect3.title: dvconnect
sect3.para: dvconnect is a small utility to send or capture raw data from and to the camcorder.

sect3.title: encodedv
sect3.para: encodedv encodes a series of images to a digital video stream.

sect3.title: playdv
sect3.para: playdv displays digital video streams on the screen.

sect3.title: libdv
sect3.para: libdv provides functions for the programs manipulating with the Quasar DV codec.
